content: dress up your favorite table with a simple elegant solution the pathways table runner is a quick and easy way to add a finished touch to any coffee table or dining room table the table runner is so versatile it can be purely functional incredibly elegant or both made with lion brand re-tweed this table runner has a rustic look that adds depth to the crossed double_crochet stitch pattern however use the worsted weight yarn of your choice for a table runner that adds just the right finished touch to your home decor with an easy to work stitch pattern and just 3 skeins of yarn you ll be adding the pathways table runner to your favorite table in no time //skill level confident beginner //stitches used chain single_crochet double_crochet //special stitches used crossed double_crochet stacked single_crochet instructions are included in the pattern
